00059     public function makeApiCall( $sApiName, $sSubApiName, $arRequestData = array() )
00060     {
00061         $_arResults = array();
00062         
00063         $this->apiToUse = $sApiName;
00064         $arRequestData['username'] = $this->apiUserName;
00065         $arRequestData['password'] = md5( $this->apiPassword );
00066         $arRequestData['action'] = $sSubApiName;
00067         
00068         if ( $_arResponse = parent::makeRequest( $sSubApiName, $arRequestData, 'POST' ) )
00069         {
00070             if ( false !== strpos( $_arResponse, '<?xml' ) )
00071             {
00072                 $_oXml = simplexml_load_string( $_arResponse );
00073                 if ( $_oXml->result == 'success' )
00074                     return $_oXml;
00075 
00076                 $this->lastErrorMessage = $_oXml->message;
00077             }
00078             else
00079             {
00080                 if ( $_arData = explode( ';', $_arResponse ) )
00081                 {
00082                     foreach ( $_arData as $_oItem )
00083                     {
00084                         $_sItem = explode( '=', $_oItem );
00085                         if ( trim( $_sItem[0] ) ) $_arResults[ $_sItem[0] ] = $_sItem[1];
00086                     }
00087 
00088                     if ( PS::o( $_arResults, 'result' ) == 'success' )
00089                         return $_arResults;
00090 
00091                     $this->lastErrorMessage = PS::o( $_arResults, 'message' );
00092                 }
00093             }
00094         }
00095         else
00096             $this->lastErrorMessage = 'Unknown error making API call';
00097         
00098         return false;
00099     }
00100
